name: green-ocean
description: Budget so well you'll be swimming in money!

scripts.setup: npm install && cd ./client && npm install ; cd ../server && npm install
scripts.launch: npm run-script dev-server && npm run-script dev-server
scripts.lint:client: cd ./client && ./node_modules/.bin/eslint "src/**/*.{js,jsx}" && echo 'Your code has passed the linting guidelines' || echo 'Please fix the errors listed above'
scripts.lint:server: cd ./server && ../node_modules/.bin/eslint "routes/**/*.js" 2>/dev/null && echo 'Your code has passed the linting guidelines' || echo 'Please fix the errors listed above'
